prompts.prompt: 🎨 Without context, share the most recent photo in your camera roll! (Work appropriate only 😄)
🎭 What's the most ridiculous way you've ever solved a problem at work?
🎬 What's your go-to TV show or movie quote that perfectly describes your job?
🎲 You're the main character in a movie about your life - who would you want to play you?
🌟 Share your most used emoji and explain your emotional attachment to it!
🎵 What's your 'getting stuff done' power song?
🍽️ Show us your weirdest snack combination that you swear is delicious!
🎮 If you could master any skill instantly, what would it be and how would you use it?
📱 What app on your phone would surprise people to know you use daily?
🎨 Draw your job in MS Paint (or equivalent) and share your masterpiece!
🦸‍♂️ What would your super-specific superhero name and power be?
☕ Show us your favorite mug and tell us its origin story!
🎭 What's your best 'accidentally muted on Zoom' story?
🎪 Share a hidden talent that has never been useful at work!
🌈 What's the most interesting thing within arm's reach of you right now?
🎬 You get to rename our company like a movie sequel (e.g., [Company] 2: Electric Boogaloo) - what's your title?
🦸‍♀️ Share your 'getting ready for a big meeting' hype song!
🎨 Show us your desk through a weird Zoom filter!
🎲 What's the most random skill you've developed because of your job?
🎭 If your job was a reality TV show, what would be its tagline?
🌟 Share your most impressive 'accidental skill' (something you're surprisingly good at)!
🎪 What's your best 'I thought I was on mute' or 'I thought my camera was off' story?
🎵 Create a job title for yourself that sounds like a fancy coffee drink!
🎮 You're writing a LinkedIn headline in the style of a movie trailer - go!
🎨 Share the most chaotic desktop screenshot you're willing to show! (Bonus points for explaining one random file name)
🦄 What's the weirdest thing you've used as a makeshift office supply?
🎭 Show us your best 'professional on top, pajamas on bottom' work from home outfit!
🚀 If your pet (or plant) wrote your performance review, what would they say?
🎪 Share your most memorable autocorrect fail in a work message!
🌈 What's your most used keyboard shortcut, interpreted as an interpretive dance move?
🖥️ Share a photo of your workspace and tell us your favorite thing about it!
📚 Show us your current reading/watching/listening list!
🌱 What's one small change you've made recently that's had a big impact?
🎯 Share a productivity hack that sounds weird but works for you!
🏃‍♀️ What's your favorite way to spend your lunch break?
🎨 Show us something you've created recently that you're proud of!
🌿 Share a photo of something that brings you joy in your workspace!
🎵 What's playing in your headphones right now?
☀️ Early bird or night owl? Share your ideal working hours and why!
🏠 What's your favorite remote work location (besides your desk)?
📱 Share a screenshot of your most-used apps!
🎮 What's your favorite way to take a quick mental break during the day?
🖼️ Show us your favorite virtual meeting background!
🌟 What's a hobby you've picked up in the last year?
🎨 Share your workspace color scheme - intentional or accidental?
🎭 What's a misconception people often have about your role?
💡 Share a strongly held opinion you've completely changed your mind about.
🌟 What's something you're quietly proud of?
📚 What's the best piece of advice you've ever received?
🎯 Tell us about someone who changed how you think about your work.
🚀 What's something you wish you could tell your younger professional self?
💭 What's a book or movie that changed your perspective on something?
🌱 Share a time when a mistake led to an unexpected positive outcome.
🎨 What's a skill you're teaching yourself right now?
💡 What's an assumption about your industry that you'd love to challenge?
🌟 What's something that energizes you about your work that might surprise others?
🎯 Share something you've created that you didn't think you could.
🚀 What's a small decision that ended up having a big impact?
💭 What's a challenge you're proud of overcoming recently?
🌱 Tell us about a project that pushed you out of your comfort zone.
🎨 What's something you do differently than most people?
💡 Share a time when feedback helped you grow.
🌟 What's something you're looking forward to learning?
🎯 What's a goal you're working towards that excites you?
💫 What's something that always makes your day better?
